summary: This document is an email correspondence between Rafael Otoya, a Senior Financial Consultant at TD Ameritrade, and Richard Kahn of HBRK Associates Inc. discussing a stock transfer form. Otoya confirms he will process the request through his Client Service Specialist.

persons.context: Rafael Otoya is responding to Richard Kahn regarding a stock transfer form and indicates he will process it.

persons.context: Richard Kahn is inquiring about the status of stocks that are to be transferred to their account.
